reviewText: I like this film, because it tries to show different sides to this great biblical account. It's great for those of faith who know God will deliver.
I am very impressed with this seller.  He has the highest integrity and he is "very" concerned with your satisfaction in the product.  I would definately purchase from the seller again.

This item is not only informative but very factual. It has re-enactments. Since the bible happed thousands of years ago we can't really show exactly what happened but this speculation is really great. It's even understandable for young children.

I was really happy with this item.
